body_html:
No, not exactly. Unless I missed something, the underlying issue is all args passed to os.path.join should be same. It can be both bytes or strs, but not mix.

You fix simply dropped the as_bytes for both components in this file, which would make the mix happen in this file not the gc.py (as the log shown in #10399). And #10399 seems be fixed by https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/9719/files already.

I am going to ping #10399 to see whether this got fixed first.

body:
No, not exactly. Unless I missed something, the underlying issue is all args passed to os.path.join should be same. It can be both bytes or strs, but not mix. 

You fix simply dropped the as_bytes for both components in this file, which would make the mix happen  in this file not the gc.py (as the log shown in #10399). And #10399 seems be fixed by  https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/9719/files already. 

I am going to ping #10399 to see whether this got fixed first.
